C# Developer -- NYC Hedge Fund

13 May 2008

C# Developer -- NYC Hedge Fund

Highly Successful New York City Hedge Fund seeks an outstanding C#/.NET developer to work on Enterprise trading applications and market data systems. Prior financial experience is required.

  • Approximately 4+ years experience designing and implementing web-based applications

HDB: the web-based applications experience requirement disqualifies me. This is the only C# developer position that Hudson has in New York, so I can see why Manny Thandi is not calling back. They have only 12 development positions going back to mid-March.
